scripts.wrangler:deploy-frame: npm run replace-wordlists && wrangler deploy --minify src/frame.tsx --config wrangler-frame.toml --env production
scripts.wrangler:deploy-all: npm run wrangler:deploy-frame && npm run wrangler:deploy-webhook
scripts.replace-wordlists: cp node_modules/@dappykit/sdk/dist/emptyModule.js node_modules/@scure/bip39/esm/wordlists/czech.js && cp node_modules/@dappykit/sdk/dist/emptyModule.js node_modules/@scure/bip39/esm/wordlists/korean.js && cp node_modules/@dappykit/sdk/dist/emptyModule.js node_modules/@scure/bip39/esm/wordlists/french.js && cp node_modules/@dappykit/sdk/dist/emptyModule.js node_modules/@scure/bip39/esm/wordlists/italian.js && cp node_modules/@dappykit/sdk/dist/emptyModule.js node_modules/@scure/bip39/esm/wordlists/japanese.js && cp node_modules/@dappykit/sdk/dist/emptyModule.js node_modules/@scure/bip39/esm/wordlists/spanish.js
